titleStmt.title: A compendious and patheticall retractation for book-making very usefull for these distracted times / by Edward Browne.
titleStmt.author: Browne, Edward.

notesStmt.note: A defense of his "A description of an annuall world" and "sacred poems" against charges of disrespect to his late master, Sir James Cambell.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
